subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador began his quest to recapture the Tour de France this year on a victorious note, winning the Tour of Algarve in Portugal and finishing 1 minute 6 seconds ahead of Sylvain Chavanel. Contador was unable to defend his Tour de France title last year because race organizers did not invite his Astana team to compete.
